name: Nightfall (itch) (oikonomopo)
description:
Nightfall is a short action platformer game created during the #stopwaitingforgodot game jam in two days. You play as a hunter and your goal is to defeat the final boss.

Game Features:

* Stamina-based combat where your actions consume a portion of your stamina. Your stamina regenerates automatically.

* Invincibility during dash. While dashing your character won't take any damage, use dash for invincibility as it is crucial to defeat the game.

* Terror. When your character is hurt terror will build up reducing your vision and stamina regeneration.

EDIT: The builds have been updated post-jam to add an extra boss attack and some sound effects. Unfortunately the original jam builds got replaced automatically when uploading the new ones.

Controls:

Keyboard controls

Move: A/D

Jump: Space

Attack: J

Dash: Shift

Gamepad controls (Xbox)

Move: Left Stick

Jump: A

Attack: X

Dash: Right Trigger (R2)
